mapper.select: SELECT * FROM board.article b INNER JOIN board.member m ON b.member_id = m.member_id WHERE b.article_title LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%' OR b.article_content LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%' ORDER BY article_id DESC

SELECT b.article_id, b.article_title, b.article_content, b.article_view_count, b.created_at AS board_created_at, b.updated_at AS board_updated_at, m.member_id, m.member_email, m.member_password, m.member_name, m.member_role, m.created_at AS member_created_at, m.updated_at AS member_updated_at, c.comment_id, c.comment_content, c.member_id, c.created_at AS comment_created_at, c.updated_at AS comment_updated_at FROM board.article b INNER JOIN board.member m ON b.member_id = m.member_id LEFT OUTER JOIN board.comment c ON b.article_id = c.article_id WHERE b.article_id = #{articleId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board.article (article_title, article_content, member_id, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{articleTitle}, #{articleContent}, #{memberId}, now(), now())
mapper.update: UPDATE board.article SET article_title = #{updateArticle.articleTitle}, article_content = #{updateArticle.articleContent}, updated_at = now() WHERE article_id = #{articleId}
